organization_id.title: Ramen Organization ID
organization_id.description: Enter the Organization ID provided to you by Ramen.

automaticUser.title: Automatically detect logged in user information
automaticUser.description:
For developers: This works by iterating through all of the properties on the window object, looking for any with an email property and an id property. So for example, this detection would work if you had the following somewhere in your appâ€™s code:
window.user = {
  id: 'a1b2c3d4',
  email: 'user@email.com'
  name: 'First Last'
  created: '2015-09-26T22:49:13.124Z'
};
Uncheck this option to manually specify which exposed property to use.

manuallySpecifiedUser.title: Global JavaScript expression which evaluates to the logged in users

custom_bug_image.title: Custom 'Bug' Image
custom_bug_image.description: When a question appears, it'll be anchored by the green Ramen 'R'. If you'd like to use your own image (a feature which is available even on Ramen's free tier), check this box.

bug_image_url.title: Custom 'Bug' Image URL
bug_image_url.description: This image should be a PNG. It should have a square aspect ratio. It should be at least 64x64 pixels. The URL must be HTTPS, although the following input field will not force that, so we're trusting you. RamenJS will not fallback to it's default image if this image doesn't load, so it should be on a CDN like S3, Cloudfront, etc....

preview_only_section.helpvalue:
Preview Only
The options below are only for previewing. They do not affect how Eager will install Ramen into your application.

Important note regarding 'Secure Mode': As of this time, if you already have a Ramen account with 'Secure Mode' enabled, these previews will not work unless you clicked to it directly from inside Ramen. We are working to address this.

preview_question.title: Preview your own question
preview_question.description: If you have your own Ramen account, and you want to preview you own questions, check this box. Your questions do not have to be published in order to be previewed here.

question_id.title: Question ID
question_id.description: To see one of your own questions, enter it's ID in the text box below. The question ID can be found in the URL of the question from your Ramen account. https://ramen.is/organizations/:org_id/manage/questions/:question_id/edit. Take the question_id portion and paste it below.

simulate_user.title: Simulate User
simulate_user.description: If you want to simulate a new or existing user, check this box.

timestamp.title: Secure Mode timestamp
timestamp.description: This is set automatically when you click on a preview button from inside Ramen. It is not required unless your Ramen Organization is already in Secure Mode.

auth_hash.description: This is set automatically when you click on a preview button from inside Ramen. It is not required unless your Ramen Organization is already in Secure Mode.
